name: The Danish Society for Nature Conservation
memberOrga: 130,000 members, 96 local branches with 1.700 voluntiers, a board consisting of 12 members and a central administration with 60 employees.
goal:
Our vision is:

•a sustainable society with a rich and diverse nature
•a clean and healthy environment
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Biodiversity Strategy 2020, Green Infrastructure Strategy, No Net Loss Initiative, Fitnesscheck of the Habitats Directive and Birds Directive, Act on Invasive Alien Species, implementation of the Water Framework Directive and Marine Strategy Framework Directive, BREF, Strategy on Climate Change, Directive on Waste, EAP.
